column6: Spider-Verse tie-in! The Spider-Verse anthology continues! So many spider-men and women! This issue: Video-game Spidey! Punk-Rock Spidey! Fairy Tale Spidey! Mexico's own Spider tale in Spanish!
column8: | artist:Mark Brooks | artist:David Lafuente | penciller (cover):Giuseppe Camuncoli | writer:Kathryn Immonen | writer:Dan Slott
